task_description: Search the internet for information on the web regarding RAG topics at PyConDE 2025.
result:
### RAG Topics at PyConDE 2025
1. **[Building an Open Source RAG System for the United Nations](https://2025.pycon.de/talks/NF8UPF/)**
   - *Description*: Beginners will gain practical knowledge about building RAG systems and their real-world applications, while advanced developers will be inspired by the strategies discussed.

2. **[Lessons learned in bringing a RAG chatbot with access to 50k+ Documents](https://2025.pycon.de/talks/XLZQFA/)**
   - *Description*: This talk shares lessons learned from developing a RAG chatbot designed to assist research and development (R&D) experts.

3. **[Enhancing RAG with Fast GraphRAG and InstructLab](https://2025.pycon.de/talks/JABVHK/)**
   - *Description*: Discussion on a scalable, interpretable, and efficient framework for enhancing RAG systems.

4. **[Securing RAG Pipelines with Fine Grained Authorization](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iBg-t99bVi4)**
   - *Description*: This talk explores methods for securing RAG pipelines effectively in practical applications.

5. **[Building a HybridRAG Document Question-Answering System](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KTpG-T3DK6k)**
   - *Description*: Insights into constructing a document question-answering system that utilizes RAG principles.

task_description: Identify the location of the conference venue in Darmstadt.
result: The PyConDE 2025 conference will be held at the **Darmstadtium**, which is a conference and event center located at **Schlossgraben 1, 64283 Darmstadt, Germany**.

task_description: Find talks specifically related to RAG topics in the conference schedule.
result:
### RAG-Related Talks at PyConDE 2025

1. **[Building an Open Source RAG System for the United Nations Negotiations on Global Plastic Pollution](https://2025.pycon.de/talks/NF8UPF/)**
   - **Date:** 2025-04-23  
   - **Room:** Europium2  
   - **Track:** PyData: Natural Language Processing & Audio (incl. Generative AI NLP)  
   - **Description:** This talk discusses the development of an open-source chat application that supports UN negotiations aimed at combating global plastic pollution.
   
2. **[Lessons learned in bringing a RAG chatbot with access to 50k+ Documents](https://2025.pycon.de/talks/XLZQFA/)**
   - **Date:** 2025-04-24  
   - **Room:** Titanium3  
   - **Track:** PyData: Generative AI  
   - **Description:** Insights gathered from developing a RAG chatbot for R&D experts that accesses over 50,000 documents.
   
3. **[Securing RAG Pipelines with Fine Grained Authorization](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iBg-t99bVi4)**
   - **Date:** 2025-04-24  
   - **Room:** Palladium  
   - **Track:** PyData: Generative AI  
   - **Description:** This talk offers methods for implementing fine-grained access control in RAG systems to safeguard data access.
   
4. **[Enhancing RAG with Fast GraphRAG and InstructLab](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qm1rlhkQ2Zk)**
   - **Date:** 2025-04-25  
   - **Room:** Platinum3  
   - **Track:** PyData: Generative AI  
   - **Description:** A discussion on advanced frameworks designed to improve the scaling and interpretability of RAG systems.
   
5. **[Building a HybridRAG Document Question-Answering System](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W3AjbakJYsU)**
   - **Date:** 2025-04-25  
   - **Room:** Platinum3  
   - **Track:** PyData: Natural Language Processing & Audio (incl. Generative AI NLP)  
   - **Description:** This talk highlights building a document question-answering system that combines RAG techniques for enhanced data retrieval.

result:
Here is your personalized conference schedule for **PyCon DE & PyData 2025**, including all relevant sessions and RAG topics:

### Conference Venue
**Darmstadtium**  
**Address**: Schlossgraben 1, 64283 Darmstadt, Germany

### April 23, 2025
